verses.t: For{G1063} we know{G1492} that{G3754} if{G1437} our{G2257} earthly{G1919} house{G3614} of{G1537} this tabernacle{G3588} were dissolved{G2647}, we have{G2192} a building{G3619} of God{G2316}, an house{G3614} not made with hands{G886}, eternal{G166} in{G1722} the heavens{G3588}.
For{G1063} in{G1722} this{G5129} we groan{G4727}, earnestly desiring{G1971} to be clothed upon{G1902} with our{G2257} house{G3588} which is from{G1537} heaven{G3772}:
If{G1489} so be that{G2532} being clothed{G1746} we shall{G2147} not{G3756} be found{G2147} naked{G1131}.

For{G1063} we that are{G5607} in{G1722} this tabernacle{G3588} do groan{G4727}, being burdened{G916}: not{G2309} for{G1894} that{G3756} we would{G1562} be unclothed{G235}, but{G1902} clothed{G2443} upon, that{G2666} mortality{G5259} might be swallowed up{G3588} of life{G2222}.

Now{G1161} he that{G3588} hath wrought{G2716} us{G2248} for{G1519} the selfsame{G846} thing{G5124} is God{G2316}, who{G3588} also{G2532} hath given{G1325} unto us{G2254} the earnest{G3588} of the Spirit{G3588}.
Therefore{G3767} we are always{G3842} confident{G2292}, knowing{G1492} that{G3754}, whilst{G2532} we are at home{G1736} in{G1722} the body{G3588}, we are absent{G1553} from{G575} the Lord{G3588}:
(For{G1063} we walk{G4043} by{G1223} faith{G4102}, not{G3756} by{G1223} sight{G1491}:)
We are confident{G2292}, I say, and{G2532} willing{G2106} rather{G3123} to be absent{G1553} from{G1537} the body{G3588}, and{G2532} to be present{G1736} with{G4314} the Lord{G3588}.
Wherefore{G1352} we labour{G5389}, that{G2532}, whether{G1535} present{G1736} or{G1535} absent{G1553}, we may be{G1511} accepted{G2101} of him{G846}.

For{G1063} we{G2248} must{G1163} all{G3956} appear{G5319} before{G1715} the judgment seat{G3588} of Christ{G3588}; that{G2443} every one{G1538} may receive{G2865} the things{G3588} done in{G1223} his body{G3588}, according{G4314} to that{G3739} he hath done{G4238}, whether{G1535} it be good{G18} or{G1535} bad{G2556}.

Knowing{G1492} therefore{G3767} the terror{G3588} of the Lord{G3588}, we persuade{G3982} men{G444}; but{G1161} we are made manifest{G5319} unto God{G2316}; and{G1161} I trust{G1679} also{G2532} are made manifest{G5319} in{G1722} your{G5216} consciences{G3588}.

For{G1063} we commend{G4921} not{G3756} ourselves{G1438} again{G3825} unto you{G5213}, but{G235} give{G1325} you{G5213} occasion{G874} to glory{G2745} on our{G2257} behalf{G5228}, that{G2443} ye may have{G2192} somewhat to{G4314} answer them{G3588} which glory{G2744} in{G1722} appearance{G4383}, and{G2532} not{G3756} in heart{G2588}.
For{G1063} whether{G1535} we be beside ourselves{G1839}, it is to God{G2316}: or whether{G1535} we be sober{G4993}, it is for your cause{G5213}.

For{G1063} the love{G26} of Christ{G3588} constraineth{G4912} us{G2248}; because{G5124} we thus judge{G2919}, that{G3754} if{G1487} one{G1520} died{G599} for{G5228} all{G3956}, then{G686} were{G599} all{G3956} dead{G599}:

And{G2532} that he died{G599} for{G5228} all{G3956}, that{G2443} they{G3588} which live{G2198} should{G2198} not henceforth{G3371} live{G2198} unto themselves{G1438}, but{G235} unto him{G3588} which died{G599} for{G5228} them{G846}, and{G2532} rose again{G1453}.

Wherefore{G5620} henceforth{G3568} know{G1492} we{G2249} no man{G3762} after{G2596} the flesh{G4561}: yea{G1161}, though{G1487} we have known{G1097} Christ{G5547} after{G2596} the flesh{G4561}, yet{G235} now henceforth{G3568} know we{G1097} him no more{G3765}.

Therefore{G5620} if{G1487} any man{G5100} be in{G1722} Christ{G5547}, he is a new{G2537} creature{G2937}: old things{G744} are passed away{G3928}behold{G2400}, all things{G3956} are become{G1096} new{G2537}.

And{G1161} all things{G3956} are of{G1537} God{G3588}, who{G3588} hath reconciled{G2644} us{G2248} to himself{G1438} by{G1223} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, and{G2532} hath given{G1325} to us{G2254} the ministry{G3588} of reconciliation{G3588};

To wit{G5613}, that{G3754} God{G2316} was{G2258} in{G1722} Christ, reconciling{G2644} the world{G2889} unto himself{G1438}, not{G3361} imputing{G3049} their{G846} trespasses{G3588} unto them{G846}; and{G2532} hath committed{G5087} unto{G1722} us{G2254} the word{G3588} of reconciliation{G3588}.

Now then{G3767} we are ambassadors{G4243} for{G5228} Christ{G5547}, as though{G5613} God{G3588} did beseech{G3870} you by{G1223} us{G2257}: we pray{G1189} you in{G5228} Christ's stead{G5547}, be ye reconciled{G2644} to God{G3588}.

For{G1063} he hath made him{G4160} to be sin{G266} for{G5228} us{G2257}, who knew{G1097} no{G3361} sin{G266}; that{G2443} we{G2249} might be made{G1096} the righteousness{G1343} of God{G2316} in{G1722} him{G846}.
